## Gene Details:

- **Gene Symbol:** <u>HIT4</u>
- **Gene Name:** HEAT INTOLERANT 4
- **Description:**   myosin-H heavy protein;(source:Araport11)

## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [CS69907]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Impaired basal but not acquired thermotolerance. Attenuated heat stress-induced chromocenter decondensation and heat stress-induced activation of transcriptionally silent loci.
